content:
Does HAPI support :not-in modifier during the search operations?For example:
<baseurl>/Condition?code:not-in=<valueset url>
I have imported the required valueset and Condition resource instances to HAPI server 5.6.0 and able to get the :in modifier working(something like Condition?code:in=<valueset url>), however not able to get search results for the "not-in" modifier.
I am looking for a use case to get search matches for resources whose code does not belong to a particular valueset.
Any information on this topic please?
I don't believe that not-in is implemented yet.

Thanks @James Agnew , Any plan for supporting this feature in the future versions?. I was referring to https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/server_plain/rest_operations_search.html and could not find the documentation for :in modifier as well. Is there any other documentation apart from the above one where all the supported search parameters are defined?
